text: Melchi may refer to: *Melchi (biblical figure), a minor biblical character *Melchi, a character from the Tezuka manga Jetter Mars *Melchi, a character from the mecha anime Strain: Strategic Armored Infantry *Melchi Zedek, an alias of Nuwabian leader Dwight York *Villa Melchi, a villa in Borgo Forte, Montemurlo, Italy
title: Melchi
